channel.title: Microsoft 365 Platform Community Blog
channel.description: Recent content on Microsoft 365 Platform Community Blog

item.title: Microsoft 365 PnP Weekly - Episode 180
item.description: UK-based independent consultant and Microsoft MVP - Chirag Patel (Patel Consulting) joins Microsoft’s Vesa Juvonen and Waldek Mastykarz in a discussion about technology migration strategies, work as consultant and MVP, and community involvement. 20 articles/videos/document updates by Microsoft/Community are highlighted.

UK-based independent consultant and Microsoft MVP - Chirag Patel (Patel Consulting) joins Microsoft’s Vesa Juvonen and Waldek Mastykarz in a discussion about technology migration strategies, work as consultant and MVP, and community involvement. 20 articles/videos/document updates by Microsoft/Community are highlighted.
item.dc:creator: Vesa Juvonen

item.title: Viva Connections & SharePoint Framework Community Call – 22nd of September, 2022
item.description: Demos on Building Viva Connections ACE for public holidays and Accelerate SPFx development with reusable open-source controls. Project releases for CLI for Microsoft 365 and PnP Modern Search. Announced Viva Home, the default landing location in Microsoft Teams.

Demos on Building Viva Connections ACE for public holidays and Accelerate SPFx development with reusable open-source controls. Project releases for CLI for Microsoft 365 and PnP Modern Search. Announced Viva Home, the default landing location in Microsoft Teams.
item.dc:creator: Vesa Juvonen
item.category: Microsoft Viva and SPFx community call

item.title: Power Platform Community Call – September 2022
item.description: Latest Power Platform related news, events and Community Tip. Demos - Parsing JSON in Power Apps, UX Tips & Tricks for Model-Driven Apps, and You can be an author of an Independent Publisher Connector.

Latest Power Platform related news, events and Community Tip. Demos - Parsing JSON in Power Apps, UX Tips & Tricks for Model-Driven Apps, and You can be an author of an Independent Publisher Connector.
item.dc:creator: David Warner II

item.title: Microsoft 365 Platform Community Call - 20th of September, 2022
item.description: Two demos - Introduction to SharePoint Online Admin APIs on Microsoft Graph and Getting started with Teams Toolkit for Visual Studio. Registration is now open for Microsoft Ignite – October 12-14, 2022. Delivered 4 articles and PnP Weekly this week.

Two demos - Introduction to SharePoint Online Admin APIs on Microsoft Graph and Getting started with Teams Toolkit for Visual Studio. Registration is now open for Microsoft Ignite – October 12-14, 2022. Delivered 4 articles and PnP Weekly this week.
item.dc:creator: Vesa Juvonen

item.title: Microsoft 365 PnP Weekly - Episode 179
item.description: Netherlands-based Global XR Technology Lead - Alexander Meijers (Avanade), joins Microsoft’s Vesa Juvonen and Waldek Mastykarz in a present/future discussion about the XR/metaverse space, opportunities, and the killer app for office workers. 14 articles/videos by Microsoft/Community are highlighted.

Netherlands-based Global XR Technology Lead - Alexander Meijers (Avanade), joins Microsoft’s Vesa Juvonen and Waldek Mastykarz in a present/future discussion about the XR/metaverse space, opportunities, and the killer app for office workers. 14 articles/videos by Microsoft/Community are highlighted.
item.dc:creator: Vesa Juvonen

item.title: Microsoft Identity Platform community call – September 2022
item.description: Learn about the different types of extensions and how and when to use them in claims mapping policies or through our UX. We cover new upcoming features related to these extensions and how to simplify your integrations.

Learn about the different types of extensions and how and when to use them in claims mapping policies or through our UX. We cover new upcoming features related to these extensions and how to simplify your integrations.
item.dc:creator: Nandeesh Swami

item.title: Microsoft 365 & Power Platform Development Community call - 15th of September, 2022
item.description: Demos: List formatting magic - neomorphic design for polished UX and Using Mockaroo Independent Publisher Connectors to automatically generate sample data. Delivered 5 Independent Publisher Connector, 2 script, and 1 Microsoft Teams samples. Check out Microsoft Teams App camp.

Demos: List formatting magic - neomorphic design for polished UX and Using Mockaroo Independent Publisher Connectors to automatically generate sample data. Delivered 5 Independent Publisher Connector, 2 script, and 1 Microsoft Teams samples. Check out Microsoft Teams App camp.
item.dc:creator: Vesa Juvonen

item.title: Unboxing the SharePoint Framework (SPFx) v1.15.2 release
item.description: In this video, MVP Andrew Connell summarize what he found while picking apart this latest release of the SharePoint Framework (SPFx): v1.15.2.
In this video, MVP Andrew Connell summarize what he found while picking apart this latest release of the SharePoint Framework (SPFx): v1.15.2.
item.dc:creator: Andrew Connell

item.title: How to generate an HTML table with the output of a SQL Server query and send it from Outlook by using Power Platform
item.description: How to generate an HTML table with a SQL Server query and send it from Outlook using Power Platform We will make use of the Premium SQL Server connector and the standard Outlook connector.
How to generate an HTML table with a SQL Server query and send it from Outlook using Power Platform We will make use of the Premium SQL Server connector and the standard Outlook connector.
item.dc:creator: Duvan Baena

item.title: Microsoft 365 Platform Community Call - 13th of September, 2022
item.description: Three demos - Microsoft Graph Postman - Scripts and advanced functionality, Introduction to Microsoft Teams Toolkit, and Introduction to app camp training package for Microsoft Teams ISVs. Delivered 5 articles, 2 Microsoft Teams samples and PnP Weekly this week.

Three demos - Microsoft Graph Postman - Scripts and advanced functionality, Introduction to Microsoft Teams Toolkit, and Introduction to app camp training package for Microsoft Teams ISVs. Delivered 5 articles, 2 Microsoft Teams samples and PnP Weekly this week.
item.dc:creator: Vesa Juvonen

item.title: Microsoft 365 PnP Weekly - Episode 178
item.description: UK-based Microsoft MVP Paul Hunt joins Microsoft’s Vesa Juvonen and Waldek Mastykarz in a mindful discussion around career, personal and technology transitions; business process engineering, change management, and work-life balance. 20 articles/videos by Microsoft/Community are highlighted.

UK-based Microsoft MVP Paul Hunt joins Microsoft’s Vesa Juvonen and Waldek Mastykarz in a mindful discussion around career, personal and technology transitions; business process engineering, change management, and work-life balance. 20 articles/videos by Microsoft/Community are highlighted.
item.dc:creator: Vesa Juvonen

item.title: CLI for Microsoft 365 - how cool is that? - Configuring settings
item.description: CLI for Microsoft 365 is a cross platform command line tool based on Node.js that helps you manage many things around Microsoft 365 and your SPFx projects (yes, that as well 🤩. rename, upgrade … you name it). You may manage OneDrive, Planner, Power Apps and Automate, Teams, Yammer, SharePoint (of course). The list keeps on growing and growing. Lets check CLI for Microsoft 365 settings and how to configure them.

CLI for Microsoft 365 is a cross platform command line tool based on Node.js that helps you manage many things around Microsoft 365 and your SPFx projects (yes, that as well 🤩. rename, upgrade … you name it). You may manage OneDrive, Planner, Power Apps and Automate, Teams, Yammer, SharePoint (of course). The list keeps on growing and growing. Lets check CLI for Microsoft 365 settings and how to configure them.
item.dc:creator: Adam Wójcik

item.title: Adaptive Cards community call – September 2022
item.description: Updates on Accessibility features in Adaptive Cards (tools include - speech, altText, tooltip, label, and CaptionSource), New video sources for Media Element (release in v1.6 will include out-of-box support for – YouTube, Vimeo, and Dailymotion), and 15-minute Q&A.

Updates on Accessibility features in Adaptive Cards (tools include - speech, altText, tooltip, label, and CaptionSource), New video sources for Media Element (release in v1.6 will include out-of-box support for – YouTube, Vimeo, and Dailymotion), and 15-minute Q&A.
item.dc:creator: J.P. Roca

item.title: Patterns and Practices for SPFx Development
item.description: When building any solution, whether it is SPFx-based or with any other programming language, it is best to make it loosely coupled to achieve easy maintenance and scalability.
When building any solution, whether it is SPFx-based or with any other programming language, it is best to make it loosely coupled to achieve easy maintenance and scalability.
item.dc:creator: Dipesh Bhanani

item.title: Viva Connections & SharePoint Framework Community Call – 8th of September, 2022
item.description: Demos on Building polished form experiences with SPFx form customizer and Building SPFx solution with Azure Communication Services integration. Project releases for SharePoint Framework, CLI for Microsoft 365, PnPjs and Modern Search. 6 web part samples delivered.

Demos on Building polished form experiences with SPFx form customizer and Building SPFx solution with Azure Communication Services integration. Project releases for SharePoint Framework, CLI for Microsoft 365, PnPjs and Modern Search. 6 web part samples delivered.
item.dc:creator: Vesa Juvonen
item.category: Microsoft Viva and SPFx community call

item.title: Microsoft 365 Platform Community Call - 6th of September, 2022
item.description: Three demos - Latest on eDiscovery Premium APIs on Microsoft Graph. New features in SharePoint Framework 1.16 preview, and Introduction to Microsoft Graph X-Ray project. Delivered 10 articles and 2 video/podcasts this week. Announced Microsoft Teams App Camp.

Three demos - Latest on eDiscovery Premium APIs on Microsoft Graph. New features in SharePoint Framework 1.16 preview, and Introduction to Microsoft Graph X-Ray project. Delivered 10 articles and 2 video/podcasts this week. Announced Microsoft Teams App Camp.
item.dc:creator: Vesa Juvonen

item.title: Microsoft 365 PnP Weekly - Episode 177
item.description: Head of Practice Modern Workplace at CPS and Microsoft MVP - Kevin McDonnell, joins Microsoft’s Vesa Juvonen and Waldek Mastykarz in a human sided discussion focused on employee experience, remote work, and Microsoft Viva. As well, 17 articles/videos by Microsoft/Community are highlighted.

Head of Practice Modern Workplace at CPS and Microsoft MVP - Kevin McDonnell, joins Microsoft’s Vesa Juvonen and Waldek Mastykarz in a human sided discussion focused on employee experience, remote work, and Microsoft Viva. As well, 17 articles/videos by Microsoft/Community are highlighted.
item.dc:creator: Vesa Juvonen

item.title: How do you monitor Azure resources with Power Platform
item.description: How do you do monitoring Azure resources with Power Platform We will use timer type objects, this not being cataloged as a connector will have a role in the construction of the process.
How do you do monitoring Azure resources with Power Platform We will use timer type objects, this not being cataloged as a connector will have a role in the construction of the process.
item.dc:creator: Duvan Baena

item.title: Series: Build Power Apps that don't look like Power Apps - Material Design part 2
item.description: For real, your low code apps don’t need to look like as if design wasn’t important.
For real, your low code apps don’t need to look like as if design wasn’t important.

item.title: Deploy static web sites with Power Platform
item.description: How to combine Azure Static Websites and Power Automate as an enterprise internal communication strategy?

item.title: Sync Contacts to Outlook using Logic App and Graph extended property
item.description: Business Case Maintaining contacts of the people whether internal or external with whom you’d want to connect frequently in a single place is always a good idea.
Business Case Maintaining contacts of the people whether internal or external with whom you’d want to connect frequently in a single place is always a good idea.

item.title: Microsoft 365 & Power Platform Development Community call - 1st of September, 2022
item.description: Demos: Independent Publisher Connector - OpenAI connector on using AI for content creation and interactions AND How to animate SVGs in Adaptive Cards. Delivered 5 Independent Publisher Connectors, 2 script and 3 Power Platform samples. Released Microsoft Teams App camp.

item.title: Microsoft 365 PnP Weekly - Episode 176
item.description: Microsoft Senior Cloud Developer Advocate – Power Platform - Daniel Laskewitz, joins Microsoft’s Vesa Juvonen and Waldek Mastykarz to exchange thoughts on Power Platform evolution, Pro/Fusion development and on interviewing at Microsoft along with 15 articles/videos delivered by Microsoft/Community this week.

Microsoft Senior Cloud Developer Advocate – Power Platform - Daniel Laskewitz, joins Microsoft’s Vesa Juvonen and Waldek Mastykarz to exchange thoughts on Power Platform evolution, Pro/Fusion development and on interviewing at Microsoft along with 15 articles/videos delivered by Microsoft/Community this week.
item.dc:creator: Vesa Juvonen

item.title: CLI for Microsoft 365 v5.7
item.description: We’ve just published a new minor version of the CLI for Microsoft 365 with new commands for working with and managing Microsoft 365 and SharePoint Framework projects on any platform.

item.description: One of my most important goals when developing Power Apps is good design.
